CustomField.description: -Manage payroll (mid & month-end) and maintain employees record. -Process and submit mandatory contribution funds and levy -Process and submit employment tax returns and employer return -Coordinate with the Finance dept. to ensure cashflow is available and pay on time -Administer HR Systems eg HR software, Personal files, Certificates, Licenses, etc
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Manage payroll (mid & month-end) and maintain employees record. -Process and submit mandatory contribution funds and levy -Process and submit employment tax returns and employer return -Coordinate with the Finance dept. to ensure cashflow is available and pay on time -Administer HR Systems eg HR software, Personal files, Certificates, Licenses, etc
CustomField.label: Payroll Management
